General.Name: Xiamen Hexing Packaging Printing Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Hexing Packaging Printing Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, design, production, and sale of packaging materials in China and internationally. It offers cartons; cardboards; color boxes; medium and high-end corrugated paper boxes; and cushioning packaging materials, including EPE, honeycomb products, and pulp molding products; books; and periodicals. The company also provides other packaging solutions. It serves food and beverages, electronic, and consumer goods industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: Building 2, Tongan Business Building, Xiamen, China, 361006
